T11dhkvadnu:0: Explanatory Remarks A number of five figures at the left side indicates the location of the key word in the basic texts. In the case of the SV, the HB and the VN, the first three figures indicate the page number, and the last two indicate the line number (for

T11dhkvadnu:3: Pramanasiddhi-chapter v.232; NB03015=NB, the Pararthanumana-chapter sutra

T11dhkvadnu:5: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units,
T11dhkvadnu:6: although they involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words
T11dhkvadnu:7: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
T11dhkvadnu:8: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
T11dhkvadnu:10: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to words or compound words.
T11dhkvadnu:11: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided,
T11dhkvadnu:12: and terms such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
T11dhkvadnu:13: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta
T11dhkvadnu:14: fundamentally remain undivided. For example: karyakaranabhava/-bhuta/-ta.
T11dhkvadnu:15: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya,
T11dhkvadnu:17: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
T11dhkvadnu:18: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
T11dhkvadnu:19: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
T11dhkvadnu:22: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example,
T11dhkvadnu:24: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of using this database to make an KWIC index.

T11dhkvadnu:270: 01211 sthitāv, asthitir ity ādikaṃ nānātva-lakṣaṇaṃ ca
T11dhkvadnu:271: 01212 kathaṃ yojyate. eṣa hi bhāvānāṃ bheda etad-virahaś ca abhedo 01213 yathā sukha-ādiṣu śakty- avasthayoś ca ekātmani. anyathā
T11dhkvadnu:273: 01216 tadātmani prādurbhāvo abhedaḥ, viparyaye bhedaḥ, yathā
T11dhkvadnu:275: 01218 bhedaś ca viparyaye sukha-duḥkhayor iti, idaṃ bheda-
T11dhkvadnu:276: 01219 abheda-lakṣaṇam, tena avirodha iti cet, na vai mṛdātmani
T11dhkvadnu:277: 01220 ghaṭasya prādurbhāvaḥ, kiṃ tarhi mṛdātmā eva kaścit 01221 ghaṭaḥ. na hy ekas trailokye mṛd-ātmā, prativijñapti-pratibhāsa-
T11dhkvadnu:278: 01222 bhedāt dravya-svabhāva-bhedāt. evaṃ hy asya api sukha-ādiṣu
T11dhkvadnu:279: 01223 caitanyeṣu ca bheda-avagamaḥ samartho bhavati, yady
T11dhkvadnu:281: 01301 saty apy etasmin kasyacid ātmano anvayād aikyam iti 01302 cet, sukha-ādiṣv apy ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ caitanyeṣu ca. na ca ghaṭa-
T11dhkvadnu:283: 01304 na ca ghaṭaṃ mṛd-ātmānaṃ ca kaścid vivekena upalakṣayati.
T11dhkvadnu:284: 01305 yena evaṃ syād idam iha prādurbhūtam iti. na hy 01306 adhiṣṭhāna-adhiṣṭhāninor vivekena anupalakṣaṇe evaṃ bhavati.
T11dhkvadnu:285: 01307 na ca śakteḥ śakty-ātmani prādurbhāva iti tasyāḥ svātmano
T11dhkvadnu:287: 01309 etena pariṇāmaḥ pratyuktaḥ, yo api hi kalpayet, yo yasya 01310 pariṇāmaḥ, sa tasmād abhinna iti, na hi śakter ātma-apariṇāma
T11dhkvadnu:288: 01311 iti, kiṃ ca idam uktaṃ bhavati pariṇāma iti. avasthitasya
T11dhkvadnu:290: 01313 ca pariṇāmaḥ yat tad dharma-antaraṃ nivartate
T11dhkvadnu:291: 01314 prādurbhavati ca, kiṃ tat tad eva avasthitaṃ dravyaṃ syāt.
T11dhkvadnu:293: 01316 yadi tat tad eva, tasya avasthānaṃ na nivṛtti-prādurbhāvāv
T11dhkvadnu:294: 01317 iti kasya tāv iti vaktavyam. avasthitasya dharma-antaram iti
T11dhkvadnu:295: 01318 ca na sidhyati. na hi tad eva tasya anapāśrita-vyapekṣa-abhedaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:297: 01320 atha dravyād artha-antaraṃ dharmaḥ, tadā tasya nivṛtti-
T11dhkvadnu:298: 01321 prādurbhāvābhyāṃ na dravyasya pariṇatiḥ. na hy artha-antaragatābhyāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:301: 01401 dravyasya dharma iti ca vyapadeśo na sidhyati sambandha-
T11dhkvadnu:302: 01402 abhāvāt. na hi kāryakāraṇabhāvād anyo vastu-sambandho
T11dhkvadnu:303: 01403 asti. na ca anayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ, svayam atadātmano 01404 atat-kāraṇatvāt, dharmasya dravyād artha-antara-bhūtatvāt.
T11dhkvadnu:305: 01407 kāryasya utpādanād dravyasya pariṇāma iti iṣṭaṃ syāt. tad aviruddham 01408 anyasya api, hetu-phala-santāne mṛd-dravya-ākhye pūrvakān
T11dhkvadnu:307: 01410 kāryasya utpattau mṛd-dravyaṃ pariṇatam iti vyavahārasya upagamāt.
T11dhkvadnu:308: 01411 na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyām anyo
T11dhkvadnu:309: 01412 vikalpaḥ sambhavati, ubhayathā api na pariṇāmaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:310: 01413 na nirvivekaṃ dravyam eva dharmaḥ, na api dravyād
T11dhkvadnu:311: 01414 artha-antaram, kiṃ tarhi, dravyasya saṃniveśo avasthā-antaram,
T11dhkvadnu:312: 01415 yathā aṅgulīnāṃ muṣṭiḥ. na hy aṅguly eva nirvivekā muṣṭiḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:313: 01416 prasāritānām amuṣṭitvāt, na apy artha-antaram, pṛthak-svabhāvena
T11dhkvadnu:314: 01417 anupalabdher iti cet, na, muṣṭer aṅguli-viśeṣatvāt. aṅgulya
T11dhkvadnu:315: 01418 eva hi kāścin muṣṭiḥ, na sarvāḥ. na hi prasāritā aṅgulyo
T11dhkvadnu:317: 01420 pratipatti-prasaṅgāt. ya eva hi khalu vivekaḥ svabhāvabhūtaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:319: 01501 ca viveka-utpāde aṅgulyaḥ prasāritā eva upalabhyeran, na hi 01502 svayaṃ svabhāvād acyutasya artha-antara-utpāde anyathā-upalabdhiḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:321: 01504 nanu uktaṃ na dravyam eva nirvivekam avasthā, na api 01505 dravyād artha-antaram iti. uktam idam, na punar yuktam, na
T11dhkvadnu:322: 01506 hi sato vastunas tattvānyatve muktvā anyaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavanti,
T11dhkvadnu:324: 01508 eka-tyāgasya apara-upādāna-nāntarīyakatvāt. aṅgulīṣu punaḥ 01509 pratikṣaṇa-vināśinīṣv anyā eva prasāritāḥ, anyā muṣṭiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:326: 01511 viṣayaḥ, bīja-aṅkura-ādi-śabda-vat vrīhy-ādi-śabda-vac ca. tena aṅgulyaḥ 01512 prasāritā na muṣṭiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:327: 01513 tad yadi prāg asad eva kāraṇe kāryaṃ bhavet, kiṃ na 01514 sarvaḥ sarvasmād bhavati. na hy asattve kaścid viśeṣa iti.
T11dhkvadnu:328: 01515 nanu sarvatra sarvasya sattve apy ayaṃ tulyo doṣaḥ. na hi 01516 sattve kaścid viśeṣaḥ. viśeṣe vā sa viśeṣas traiguṇyād 01517 bhinnaḥ syāt, tadbhāve viśeṣasya ananvayāt. sataś ca sarvātmanā
T11dhkvadnu:330: 01519 ca, sādhyasya kasyacid abhāvāt yasya kasyacid atiśayasya
T11dhkvadnu:331: 01520 tatra kathaṃcid asata utpattau, so atiśayas tatra asan
T11dhkvadnu:332: 01521 kathaṃ jāyate. jātau vā sarvaḥ sarvasmāj jāyeta iti tulyaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:334: 01601 na atiśayas tatra sarvathā na asti, kathaṃcit sata eva bhāvād
T11dhkvadnu:335: 01602 iti cet, yathā na asti, sa prakāras tatra asan kathaṃ jāyeta.
T11dhkvadnu:336: 01603 na ca sarvathā sataḥ kaścij janma-artha ity uktam.
T11dhkvadnu:337: 01604 asato api kāryasya kāraṇād utpāde, yo yaj-janana-svabhāvaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:338: 01605 tata eva tasya janma, na anyasmād iti niyamaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:339: 01606 tasya api sa svabhāva-niyamaḥ sva-hetor ity anādi-bhāva-svabhāva-
T11dhkvadnu:341: 01608 api ca, yadi mṛt-piṇḍe ghaṭo asti, kathaṃ tad-avasthāyāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:342: 01609 na paścād-vad upalabdhiḥ, tad-arthakriyā vā. vyakter aprādurbhāvād 01610 iti cet, tasya eva tad-arthakriyā-ādi-bhāve ghaṭatvāt,
T11dhkvadnu:343: 01611 tad-rūpasya ca prāg asattvāt, kathaṃ ghaṭo asti. na hi rūpa-antarasya
T11dhkvadnu:344: 01612 sattve rūpa-antaram asti. na ca rūpa-pratibhāsa-bhede vastv-
T11dhkvadnu:347: 01615 sa na asty eva. na hi tasya tat-svabhāva-sthitāv anupalabdhiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:351: 01619 tena anupalabdhyā kasyacid vyavacchedaṃ prasādhayatā 01620 tasya yathokta-upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptir upadarśaniyā. upadarśya-
T11dhkvadnu:355: 01624 kāraṇa-anupalabdhāv api kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ 01625 prasādhya kāraṇasya nivṛtti-prasādhanaṃ samarthanam. tad-
T11dhkvadnu:356: 01626 viruddha-upalabdhiṣv api dvayor viruddhayor ekasya viruddhasya 01627 upadarśanaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:360: 01704 athavā sādhyate tena pareṣām apratīto artha iti sādhanaṃ 01705 trirūpa-hetu-vacana-samudāyaḥ. tasya aṅgaṃ pakṣa-dharma-
T11dhkvadnu:361: 01706 ādi-vacanam. tasya ekasya apy avacanam asādhana-aṅga-vacanam.
T11dhkvadnu:362: 01707 tad api vādino nigrahasthānam tad-avacane hetu-rūpasya
T11dhkvadnu:364: 01709 athavā tasya eva sādhanasya yan na aṅgaṃ pratijñā-upanaya-
T11dhkvadnu:368: 01713 ca sādhana-prayoga ekasya eva abhidhānena siddher bhāvāt,
T11dhkvadnu:369: 01714 dvitīyasya asāmarthyam iti tasya apy asādhana-aṅgasya abhidhānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:372: 01717 apy upadeyam eva. na, vaiyarthyāt. asaty api pratijñā-
T11dhkvadnu:373: 01718 vacane yathoktāt sādhana-vākyād bhavaty eva iṣṭa-artha-siddhir
T11dhkvadnu:374: 01719 ity apārthakaṃ tasya upādānam. yadi ca viṣaya-upadarśanam
T11dhkvadnu:375: 01720 antareṇa pratīter anutpattiḥ, kathaṃ na pratijñā sādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:376: 01721 avayavaḥ. na hi pakṣa-dharma-ādi-vacanasya api pratīti-hetu-
T11dhkvadnu:377: 01722 bhāvād anyaḥ sādhana-arthaḥ. sa pratijñā-vacane api tulya iti
T11dhkvadnu:379: 01801 kevalasya asāmarthyād asādhanatvam iti cet, tat tulyaṃ 01802 pakṣa-dharma-vacanasya api iti tad api na sādhana-avayavaḥ syāt.
T11dhkvadnu:380: 01803 na hi pakṣa-dharma-vacanāt kevalāt pratipatter utpattiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:385: 01808 athavā sādhanasya siddher yan na aṅgam asiddho viruddho 01809 anaikāntiko vā hetvābhāsaḥ. tasya api vacanaṃ vādino
T11dhkvadnu:388: 01812 dṛṣṭāntābhāsasya asādhana-aṅgasya vacanam api vādino nigrahasthānam,
T11dhkvadnu:389: 01813 asamartha-upādānād eva. na hi tair hetoḥ sambandhaḥ 01814 śakyate pradarśayitum, apradarśanād asāmarthyam.
T11dhkvadnu:390: 01816 athavā siddhiḥ sādhanam tad-aṅgaṃ dharmo yasya arthasya
T11dhkvadnu:392: 01818 tad-vyatirekeṇa aparasya apy ajijñāsitasya viśeṣasya śāstra-āśraya-
T11dhkvadnu:398: 01904 yeṣa panna-ādinā bahiḥ prativādinaḥ prāśnikānāṃ ca
T11dhkvadnu:399: 01905 nyāyadarśinām iti. ebhiḥ kathā-viccheda eva karaṇīyaḥ, na
T11dhkvadnu:400: 01906 hi kaścid arthaḥ kvacit kriyamāṇa-prasaṅge na prayujyate,
T11dhkvadnu:401: 01907 nairātmyavādinas tu tat-sādhane nṛtya-gīty-āder api tatra 01908 prasaṅgāt.
T11dhkvadnu:402: 01909 yathā pratijñā-abhidhāna-pūrvakaṃ kaścit kuryāt. na asty 01910 ātmā iti vayaṃ bauddhā brūmaḥ. ke bauddhāḥ. ye buddhasya 01911 bhagavataḥ śāsanam abhyupagatāḥ. ko buddho bhagavān.
T11dhkvadnu:403: 01912 yasya śāsane bhadanta-aśvaghoṣaḥ pravrajitaḥ. kaḥ punar 01913 bhadanta-aśvaghoṣaḥ. yasya rāṣṭra-pālaṃ nāma nāṭakam.
T11dhkvadnu:404: 01914 kīdṛśaṃ rāṣṭra-pālaṃ nāma nāṭakam iti prasaṅgaṃ kṛtvā 01915 nāndyante tataḥ praviśati sūtradhāra iti paṭhen nṛtyed
T11dhkvadnu:405: 01916 gāyec ca. prativādī taṃ ca sarva-prasaṅgaṃ na anukartuṃ 01917 samartha iti parājitaḥ syād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:407: 01919 na ca evaṃ prastutasya paryavasānaṃ sambhavati, aniścaya-
T11dhkvadnu:409: 02001 kathaṃ ca evaṃ jaya-parājayau, prativādino apy ananubhāṣaṇasya
T11dhkvadnu:411: 02003 vyājena sambhavād aniścitatvāc ca. tasmāt pratijñā-vacanam
T11dhkvadnu:412: 02004 eva tāvan na nyāyyam. kutaḥ punar tatra ajijñāsita-
T11dhkvadnu:414: 02006 ca. sarvaś ca ayaṃ prakāro durmatibhiḥ śaṭhair nyāya-sāmarthyena
T11dhkvadnu:417: 02010 ghoṣaṇam, nityaḥ śabdo anityo vā iti vāde dvādaśa-lakṣaṇa-
T11dhkvadnu:419: 02012 nityatā-adhikaraṇa-śabda-ghaṭa-anyatara-sadvitīyo ghaṭa iti 02013 pratijñām uparacayya dvādaśa-lakṣaṇa-artha-vyākhyānam. sarvo
T11dhkvadnu:420: 02014 ayaṃ durmatīnām asāmarthya-pracchādana-upāyaḥ, na tu 02015 satyair asty upetaḥ, tattva-parīkṣāyāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:423: 02018 iti cet, anyasya apy ajijñāsitasya kiṃ na bhavati. na hi 02019 asya api kācid vivakṣita-sādhya-dharma-siddhau
T11dhkvadnu:425: 02021 ādi-siddhim antareṇa na anityatā-siddhiḥ, tathāvidhas tu 02022 dharmaḥ pṛthag anukto api sādhya-dharme antarbhāvāt pakṣīkṛta 02023 eva iti na pṛthag asya upanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā. tasmād
T11dhkvadnu:426: 02101 evaṃvidhasya api tadānīṃ prativādinā ajijñāsitasya arthasya
T11dhkvadnu:427: 02102 pratijñāyām anyatra vā upanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā artha-antara-
T11dhkvadnu:429: 02104 eva sādhana-aṅgaṃ vācyam. na prasaṅga upakṣeptavyaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:432: 02107 tathābhāve pratipādite, anyathā dvayor ekasya api
T11dhkvadnu:435: 02110 sādhane prayukte abhyupagata-uttara-pakṣo yatra viṣaye prativādī
T11dhkvadnu:436: 02111 yadā na doṣam udbhāvayati tadā parājito vaktavyaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:439: 02114 aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭānta-doṣaś ca. teṣām anudbhāvanam apratyāyanam
T11dhkvadnu:441: 02116 tat punaḥ sādhanasya nirdoṣatvāt, sadoṣatve api prativādino
T11dhkvadnu:442: 02117 ajñānāt pratipādana-asāmarthyād vā. na hi duṣṭa-sādhana-abhidhāne
T11dhkvadnu:443: 02118 api vādinaḥ prativādino apratipādite doṣe parājaya-
T11dhkvadnu:445: 02120 apekṣayā jaya-parājaya-vyavasthāpanāt. kevalaṃ hetvābhāsād 02121 bhūta-pratipatter abhāvād apratipādakasya jayo api na asty
T11dhkvadnu:446: 02122 eva. na hi tattva-cintāyāṃ kaścic chala-vyavahāraḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:447: 02201 yady evaṃ kiṃ na parājayaḥ, tattva-siddhi-bhraṃśāt.
T11dhkvadnu:448: 02202 na anirākaraṇāt. nirākaraṇaṃ hi tasya anyena parājayaḥ, na
T11dhkvadnu:450: 02204 sādhana-abhāve asaty api pratiyogini bhāvāt. pratiyoginaś ca 02205 tan-nirākaraṇe asāmarthyāt parājayasya anutpatter aparājayaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:451: 02206 tasmād ayam asamartha-sādhana-abhidhāyy api pareṇa 02207 tathābhāve apratipādite aparājito vaktavyaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:452: 02208 chala-vyavahāre api vijigīṣūṇāṃ vāda iti cet, na, durjana-
T11dhkvadnu:453: 02209 vipratipatty-adhikāre satāṃ śāstra-pravṛtteḥ. na hi para-anugraha-
T11dhkvadnu:455: 02211 ādīn asad-vyavahārān upadiśanti. na ca para-vipaṃsanena
T11dhkvadnu:456: 02212 lābha-satkāra-śloka-upārjanaṃ satām ācāraḥ. na api tathā-pravṛttebhyaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:459: 02215 sadbhir lābha-ādy-upārjanāya praṇīyante. tasmān na yoga-vihitaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:460: 02216 kaścid vijigīṣu-vādo nāma. para-anugraha-pravṛttās tu santo 02217 vipratipannaṃ pratipādayanto nyāyam anusareyuḥ sat-
T11dhkvadnu:462: 02219 tasya eva anuprabodhāya. tad eva nyāya-anusaraṇaṃ satāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:463: 02220 vādaḥ, ukta-nyāye tattva-arthī cet pratipadyeta, tad-apratipattāv
T11dhkvadnu:468: 02224 api iti vaktavyam. tasmān na jyāyān ayaṃ tattva-rakṣaṇa-
T11dhkvadnu:471: 02303 para-upatāpa-vidhāne api tattva-apratiṣṭhāpanāt. anyathā api nyāya-
T11dhkvadnu:475: 02307 athavā yo na doṣaḥ sādhanasya tad-bhāve api vādinā sādhayitum
T11dhkvadnu:476: 02308 iṣṭasya arthasya siddher vighāta-abhāvāt, tasya udbhāvanaṃ 02309 prativādino nigraha-adhikaraṇam,
T11dhkvadnu:477: 02311 yathā sādhyatayā aniṣṭo api vādino dharmaḥ, śāstra-upagamāt
T11dhkvadnu:478: 02312 sādhya iti tad-viparyāsena virodha-udbhāvanam. na asty 02313 ātmā iti tava pratijñā-padayor virodha iti pratijñā-doṣa-udbhāvanam.
T11dhkvadnu:480: 02315 iti hetor dharma-viśeṣatvāt pratijñārthaikadeśa ity 02316 asiddha-udbhāvanam, sarvāṇi
T11dhkvadnu:481: 02317 jāty-uttarāṇi ity evam-āder doṣasya udbhāvanam adoṣa-udbhāvanam.
T11dhkvadnu:482: 02319 tasya vādinā doṣa-ābhāsatve prakhyāpite prativādī parājito
T11dhkvadnu:484: 02321 punaḥ sādhane na dvayor ekasya api jaya-parājayau, tattva-
T11dhkvadnu:485: 02322 aprakhyāpanāt adoṣa-udbhāvanāc ca. apratipakṣāyāṃ ca 02323 pakṣa-siddhau kṛtāyāṃ jetā bhavati.
T11dhkvadnu:486: 02401 tasmāj jigīṣatā sva-pakṣaś ca sthāpanīyaḥ para-pakṣaś ca
T11dhkvadnu:487: 02402 nirākartavyaḥ. nirdoṣe sādhana-abhidhāne api vādinaḥ prativādinā
T11dhkvadnu:489: 02404 jaya-parājayau, na anyathā, bhāvatas tattva-abhidhāne api
T11dhkvadnu:492: 02406 prativādino apy atra, bhāvato mithyā-pratipatter iti.
T11dhkvadnu:494: 02501 anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate.
T11dhkvadnu:495: 02502 yatra idaṃ yathoktaṃ nigrahasthāna-lakṣaṇaṃ na asti tasya
T11dhkvadnu:496: 02503 nigrahasthānatvam ayuktam iti na uktam asmābhiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:498: 02505 nigrahasthānam iti atra bhāṣyakāra-mataṃ dūṣayitvā vārttikakāro 02506 ayaṃ sthita-pakṣam āha. tam eva brūmaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:499: 02507 pratidṛṣṭāntasya yo dharmas taṃ yadā sva-dṛṣṭānte
T11dhkvadnu:500: 02508 abhyanujānāti nigṛhīto veditavyaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭaś ca asāv ante ca
T11dhkvadnu:501: 02509 vyavasthita iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. sva-dṛṣṭāntaḥ sva-pakṣaḥ, pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:503: 02511 abhyanujānan parājitaḥ, yathā anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
T11dhkvadnu:504: 02512 iti brūvan pratipakṣa-vādini sāmānyena pratyavasthite āha
T11dhkvadnu:505: 02513 yadi sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo apy evam astv iti
T11dhkvadnu:509: 02517 kiṃ kṛto anena prakāreṇa pratijñāṃ tyajataḥ pratijñāhānir
T11dhkvadnu:510: 02518 iti. sambhavati hy anyena api prakāreṇa hetu-doṣa-udbhāvana-
T11dhkvadnu:512: 02520 para-pakṣa-upagamaś ca. idam eva ca pratijñāhāneḥ
T11dhkvadnu:513: 02521 pradhānaṃ nimittam evaṃ pratipāditena pratijñā hātavyā
T11dhkvadnu:515: 02601 idaṃ punar asambaddham eva sāmānyaṃ nityam aindriyakam
T11dhkvadnu:516: 02602 ity ukte śabdo apy evam astv iti. kaḥ svastha-ātmā svayam
T11dhkvadnu:517: 02603 aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad iti bruvan sāmānyena
T11dhkvadnu:519: 02605 sāmānyasya api nityasya aindriyakatve apy anitye ghaṭe darśanāt 02606 saṃśayitaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:520: 02607 jāḍyāt pratipadyeta api iti cet, tathā api kiṃ sāmānyasya
T11dhkvadnu:522: 02608 evam eva nityaḥ śabda iti vaktavyaṃ jaḍasya
T11dhkvadnu:524: 02610 na ca nitya-sāmānya-upadarśanena tad-dharmaṃ śabde pratipadyamāne 02611 pratipakṣa-dharma-abhyanujñāto bhavati, anityaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:525: 02612 śabda iti ca vadato nityaḥ śabda ity āñjasaḥ pratipakṣaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:531: 02618 pratijñā-antaram pratijñāto artho anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād 02619 ity eva, tasya hetu-vyabhicāra-upadarśanena pratiṣedhe
T11dhkvadnu:534: 02702 ghaṭo asarvagato anitya eva śabdo apy asarvagato anitya 02703 iti. etat pratijñā-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ sādhana-sāmarthye
T11dhkvadnu:535: 02704 apy aparijñānāt. sa hi pūrvasyā anityaḥ śabda iti
T11dhkvadnu:536: 02705 pratijñāyāḥ sādhanāya uttarām asarvagataḥ śabda iti pratijñām
T11dhkvadnu:537: 02706 āha. tad-darśanāya tad-artha-nirdeśa ity āha. tad-arthaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:539: 02708 nirdeśaḥ. na ca pratijñā pratijñā-antara-sādhane samarthā
T11dhkvadnu:541: 02710 atra api na evam-bruvatā pratijñā-antaraṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya
T11dhkvadnu:542: 02711 uktaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi viśeṣaṇam aindriyakatvasya
T11dhkvadnu:543: 02712 hetoḥ sāmānye vṛttyā vyabhicāra udbhāvite asarvagatatve
T11dhkvadnu:545: 02714 pariharati. na punaḥ pratijñā-antaram āha, asarvagatatvasya
T11dhkvadnu:547: 02717 yad apy uktaṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya uttarāṃ pratijñām 02718 āha iti tad apy ayuktam. na hi pratijñā pratijñā-sādhanāya
T11dhkvadnu:548: 02719 ucyamānā pratijñā-antaraṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi hetv-āder ananyatamaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:550: 02801 syān na sādhya-nirdeśaḥ. udāharaṇa-sādharmya-ādeś ca hetu-lakṣaṇasya
T11dhkvadnu:551: 02802 asarvagatve bhāvāt pratijñā-lakṣaṇasya ca abhāvāt, hetutvam
T11dhkvadnu:553: 02804 asambaddhaṃ ca idaṃ pratijñāṃ pratijñā-sādhanāya āha iti.
T11dhkvadnu:554: 02805 yo hi prāk pratijñām uktvā hetu-udāharaṇa-ādikaṃ vaktuṃ
T11dhkvadnu:555: 02806 jānāti, sa kiṃcid anukramaṃ sādhanasya jānāty eva hi, jānan
T11dhkvadnu:557: 02808 upādadīta. upādadatā ca anena pratijñā-mātreṇa siddhir
T11dhkvadnu:558: 02809 iṣṭā bhavati, tataś ca na prāg api hetuṃ brūyāt.
T11dhkvadnu:560: 02811 aśakyatvāt, lakṣaṇa-niyamo apy asambaddha eva pratijñā-
T11dhkvadnu:563: 02814 ekam eva lakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ syāt. na ca evaṃvidhaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:564: 02815 kaścid vivādeṣu dṛṣṭa-pūrvo vyavahāro yena tad-arthaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:565: 02816 yatnaḥ kriyate. na ca bāla-pralāpa-anudiśya śāstraṃ pravartate 02817 pravṛttau ca kā niṣṭhā teṣām aniṣṭānāt. dṛśyate ca 02818 viduṣām api na atinirūpaṇād asiddha-abhidhānam iti. vyavahāra-
T11dhkvadnu:567: 02901 tasmād iha api yadi nivṛtta-ākāṅkṣe vādini paro anaikāntikatām
T11dhkvadnu:568: 02902 udbhāvayet, asādhana-aṅgasya anaikāntikasya abhidhānān 02903 nigrahasthānaṃ vādinaḥ, evaṃ yadi prativādī sat sāmānyam 02904 aindriyakaṃ nityaṃ ca pramāṇena pratipādayituṃ 02905 śaknuyāt. anudiśya-apramāṇakaṃ śāstra-upagamaṃ pramāṇena
T11dhkvadnu:569: 02906 eṣām arthānām apratipādane na bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvanam iti
T11dhkvadnu:570: 02907 na kaścit parājayo abhyupagama-mātreṇa vastu-siddher abhāvāt
T11dhkvadnu:572: 02909 sādhana-abhidhānāt tu jetā api na bhavati iti.
T11dhkvadnu:573: 02910 anitya-ākāṅkṣe punar vādini na kaścid doṣo viśeṣaṇa-abhidhānena
T11dhkvadnu:576: 02913 dravyam iti pratijñā, rūpa-ādibhyo artha-antarasya anupalabdher
T11dhkvadnu:577: 02914 iti hetuḥ, so ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ. etena
T11dhkvadnu:578: 02915 eva pratijñā-virodho apy ukto yatra pratijñā sva-vacanena
T11dhkvadnu:579: 02916 virudhyate, yathā śramaṇā garbhiṇī, na asty ātmā iti vā, hetu-
T11dhkvadnu:580: 02917 virodho api yatra pratijñayā hetur virudhyate, yathā sarvaṃ 02918 pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti. etena pratijñayā 02919 dṛṣṭānta-virodho api vyākhyātaḥ. hetoś ca dṛṣṭānta-ādibhir
T11dhkvadnu:583: 03002 virodhaḥ, yaḥ para-pakṣaṃ sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā vyabhicārayati,
T11dhkvadnu:585: 03004 ca, yaś ca sva-pakṣa-anapekṣaṃ hetuṃ prayuṅkte 03005 anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād iti, tasya sva-siddhasya gotva-āder
T11dhkvadnu:590: 03010 tad-āśrayas tat-kṛto vā hetu-dṛṣṭāntayor na virodha iti na pratijñā-
T11dhkvadnu:592: 03012 syād etat, asaty api pratijñā-prayoge gamyamāno api pratijñā-
T11dhkvadnu:593: 03013 hetvor virodho bhavati, yathā rūpa-ādibhyo artha-antarasya
T11dhkvadnu:595: 03014 tad guṇa-vyatiriktam, na upalabhyate ca rūpa-ādibhyo
T11dhkvadnu:596: 03015 artha-antaraṃ dravyam ity ukte api gamyata eva sādhya-
T11dhkvadnu:599: 03018 satyam, syād ayaṃ virodhaḥ, yadi hetuḥ sādhya-dharma-
T11dhkvadnu:602: 03103 pratibhāsa-anupalabdhiḥ, tat tad-vyatirekeṇa na asti iti
T11dhkvadnu:604: 03104 viparyaya-sādhanād viruddho hetur asmābhir ukta eva iti
T11dhkvadnu:605: 03105 bhavaty eva idaṃ nigraha-adhikaraṇam, yady evaṃvidhaḥ pratijñā-
T11dhkvadnu:606: 03106 hetvor virodha iṣṭaḥ. atha punar asya upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
T11dhkvadnu:607: 03107 prāptir lupyate, tadā na kaścit pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:608: 03108 vyatiriktānām api bhāvānāṃ kutaścid viprakarṣiṇāṃ tad-
T11dhkvadnu:611: 03111 iti tatra idam eva nigraha-adhikaraṇam asādhana-aṅga-
T11dhkvadnu:612: 03112 bhūtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ sādhana-vākye prayogaḥ; na virodhaḥ 03113 tad-adhikaraṇatvāt. yadi pratijñā-anapekṣo virodhaḥ syāt, syāt
T11dhkvadnu:617: 03117 ye tu kecid vicāra-prasaṅgeṣv ekatra sādhye bahavo
T11dhkvadnu:619: 03119 vṛtteḥ sāmarthyam anyathā dvitīyasya vaiyarthyāt. yadi hi 03120 tatra apy eka-prayogam antareṇa aparasya prayogo na sambhavet,
T11dhkvadnu:620: 03121 na tadā dvitīyasya kaścit sādhana-arthaḥ pratīta-pratipādana-
T11dhkvadnu:621: 03122 abhāvāt. tasmān na pratijñāyāḥ sva-vacana-virodho nāma
T11dhkvadnu:623: 03201 na ca na asty ātmā ity atra kaścit pratijñā-virodhaḥ na asty ātma-
T11dhkvadnu:625: 03203 hi virodhaḥ syāt. na ca sva-lakṣaṇaṃ śabdārtha iti.
T11dhkvadnu:626: 03204 yaḥ punaḥ pratijñayā bādhanād hetu-virodha uktaḥ, yathā
T11dhkvadnu:627: 03205 sarvaṃ pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti, na atra 03206 pratijñāyāḥ prayogaḥ, na api hetor, yena virodhaḥ syāt, kiṃ
T11dhkvadnu:632: 03212 upadarśayan śabdārtham adhikṛtya sarvaṃ pṛthag 03213 iti brūyāt. etena tad-virodhaḥ pratyuktaḥ. dṛṣṭānta-upadarśanaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:633: 03214 ca etad anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka-anityatvād iti yathā. kvacid
T11dhkvadnu:637: 03218 yadi dṛṣṭānta-prayogaḥ kiṃ ṛjunā eva tat-prayoga-krameṇa
T11dhkvadnu:638: 03219 na prayukto vipratipatti-viṣayaś ca kiṃ na darśita iti cet, na,
T11dhkvadnu:640: 03221 ca. ata eva na pratijñayā hetor bādhanam. na ca ekam
T11dhkvadnu:641: 03222 eva kiṃcin na asti iti bruvāṇaḥ kaścit tat-samuccaya-rūpam
T11dhkvadnu:642: 03223 ekaṃ samūham icchati yena virodhaḥ syāt.
T11dhkvadnu:643: 03301 yo api yugapat ṣaṭkena yogād ity ādinā paramāṇor 03302 bhedam āha, na tasya apy ekaḥ samuccaya-rūpaḥ sādhayitum
T11dhkvadnu:644: 03303 iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tarhy abhāva eva eka-aneka-pratiṣedhāt. ataḥ so api
T11dhkvadnu:645: 03304 na samūhas tasya iṣṭaḥ, na tatra śabda iti na virodhaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:646: 03305 na virodho ayaṃ pūrvakāt pratijñā-hetu-virodhāt bhidyate
T11dhkvadnu:647: 03306 yena pṛthag ucyeta. tatra hetu-pratijñāyor bādhanam, iha
T11dhkvadnu:648: 03307 pratijñayā hetor ity asti bheda iti cet, artha-virodhe hi hetu-
T11dhkvadnu:650: 03309 dviṣv ity api parasparaṃ bādhakam eka-artha-saṃnidhāv apara-
T11dhkvadnu:653: 03312 api ca ayaṃ viruddho aviruddho vā sati hetu-prayoge vyadhikaraṇatvād
T11dhkvadnu:655: 03314 sa khalu ucyamāna eva atad-dharmatayā pratīto vaktuḥ parājayam
T11dhkvadnu:658: 03317 api ca sarvatra ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ sambhavan 03318 na dvayīṃ hetu-doṣa-jātim atipatati viruddhatām asiddhatāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:659: 03319 ca iti. viruddhatā siddhe hetor dharmiṇi bhāve sādhya-dharma-
T11dhkvadnu:661: 03401 punar dharmiṇi pratijñātā-artha-siddhau viruddhayoḥ svabhāvayor 03402 ekatra asambhavāt. na ca anyathā virodhaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:663: 03404 virodhād virodha-sambhava iti cet, apramāṇa-yoge tu ubhayor 03405 dharmiṇi saṃśayaḥ. tathā sati hetor dharmiṇi bhāva-saṃśaye
T11dhkvadnu:664: 03406 asiddhatā eva hetu-doṣa ity asiddha-viruddhābhyām anyo
T11dhkvadnu:665: 03407 na pratijñayā virodho nāma parājaya-hetuḥ. asiddha-viruddhe
T11dhkvadnu:666: 03408 ca hetv-ābhāsa-vacanād eva ukta iti na pṛthak pratijñā-virodho
T11dhkvadnu:669: 03411 cet, syād etat pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti pratijñā-hetū āśritya
T11dhkvadnu:670: 03412 ubhaya-āśrayo bhavati. tatra yadā pratijñā-virodho vivakṣitas
T11dhkvadnu:671: 03413 tadā pratijñā-virodha iti ucyate, yadā pratijñāyā hetor vā
T11dhkvadnu:672: 03414 virodhas tadā viruddho hetur iti. ataḥ pratijñā-virodho hetu-virodho
T11dhkvadnu:673: 03415 vā ity adoṣaḥ. tatra hetor udāharaṇaṃ nityaḥ śabda 03416 utpatti-dharmakatvād iti, pratijñā-virodhasya na asty ātmā iti,
T11dhkvadnu:675: 03418 ity ādi, pratijñayā hetu-virodha-udāharaṇaṃ na asty eko
T11dhkvadnu:678: 03421 yathoktaṃ prāk. anapekṣe ca kevale svataḥ pratijñā-
T11dhkvadnu:679: 03422 virodhe vivakṣite pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti hetu-grahaṇam
T11dhkvadnu:680: 03501 asambaddham. na ca utpatti-dharmakatvān nityam ity 03502 atra api hetu-virodho yuktaḥ, pratijñayā hi hetor bādhane
T11dhkvadnu:681: 03503 hetu-virodhaḥ. iha tu hetunā pratijñā bādhyata iti pratijñā-virodho
T11dhkvadnu:684: 03506 yad apy uktam etena pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodha-ādayo api
T11dhkvadnu:685: 03507 vaktavyā bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyena iti tatra api pakṣīkṛta-dharma-
T11dhkvadnu:686: 03508 viparyayavati dṛṣṭānte virodhaḥ syāt. viruddhe ca dṛṣṭānte
T11dhkvadnu:688: 03510 viruddhas tadā hetv-ābhāsaḥ sādhāraṇāyām aprasādhite vā
T11dhkvadnu:691: 03513 kaścid hetu-doṣo dṛṣṭānta-virodhaś ca pratijñayā iti cet, na,
T11dhkvadnu:692: 03514 tad api saṃśaya-hetutva-anativṛtter dṛṣṭānta-virodho hi pratijñāyāḥ 03515 sādharmye doṣaḥ, na vaidharmye, abhimatatvāt.
T11dhkvadnu:695: 03517 api hetor na avyabhicāra-dharmatā śakyā darśayitum 03518 iti na apradarśita-avinābhāva-sambaddhād hetor niścayaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:696: 03519 tan na pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodho hetv-ābhāsān ativartate.
T11dhkvadnu:697: 03601 ubhayathā api doṣo astv iti cet, na na hetu-doṣasya prāk
T11dhkvadnu:700: 03604 hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ viruddhe dṛṣṭānte na sambhavati iti prāk
T11dhkvadnu:701: 03605 prayuktasya hetor doṣeṇa parājaya iti na uttara-dṛṣṭānta-apekṣayā
T11dhkvadnu:702: 03606 virodhaś cintām arhati. hetor api dṛṣṭānta-virodhe asādhāraṇatvaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:703: 03607 viruddhatvaṃ vā vaidharmye yadi vṛttiḥ syāt.
T11dhkvadnu:704: 03608 pramāṇa-virodhe tu hetoḥ, yathā na dahano agniḥ śaityād 03609 ity ādi hy asiddho
T11dhkvadnu:707: 03612 sarva ete sādhana-virodhā hetv-ābhāseṣv eva antarbhavanti 03613 iti hetv-ābhāsa-vacanena eva uktāḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:708: 03614 yat tu viruddham uttaraṃ para-pakṣe sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā
T11dhkvadnu:709: 03615 anaikāntika-codanā iti, tad asambaddham eva. yadi hi sva-siddhena
T11dhkvadnu:711: 03617 tasya tat sva-pakṣa-viruddhaṃ na abhimatam iti virodha
T11dhkvadnu:712: 03618 yujyeta. sa hi svayaṃ pratipanne gotve hetu-vṛtteḥ saṃśayāno
T11dhkvadnu:713: 03619 apratipattim ātmanas tathā khyāpayati. sa ca hetuḥ
T11dhkvadnu:715: 03701 anaikāntika eva prasādhite tu sāmarthye gotve
T11dhkvadnu:716: 03702 avṛttyā hetor na saṃśaya eva sarva-saṃśaya-prakārāṇāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:720: 03706 saṃśaya-hetum eva āha iti. yat punar uktam
T11dhkvadnu:722: 03707 vastunā anaikāntika-codanā iti, tatra apy avaśyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:724: 03709 asamarthite anyatra api tulyam iti na ubhaya-siddha-itarayor
T11dhkvadnu:728: 03712 tad-abhidhānena eva uktā iti na pṛthag nigrahasthāneṣu uktā iti,
T11dhkvadnu:729: 03713 tad apy avayava-antara-vādino ayuktam. yo avayava-antaraṃ
T11dhkvadnu:730: 03714 dṛṣṭāntaṃ hetor āha, tasya na hetv-ābhāsa-uktyā dṛṣṭānta-ābhāsa-
T11dhkvadnu:731: 03715 uktir vyāpyā tad-vacanena gamyamānasya tasmāt sādhana-antara-
T11dhkvadnu:733: 03717 antarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntasya api hetāv antarbhāva iṣṭo bhavati,
T11dhkvadnu:734: 03718 tathā ca na dṛṣṭāntaḥ pṛthak sādhana-avayavaḥ syād apṛthag-vṛtteḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:735: 03719 yo dṛṣṭānta-sādhyo arthas tasya hetāv antarbhāvād
T11dhkvadnu:736: 03720 hetunā eva sādhita iti na dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthak kiṃcit sāmarthyam.
T11dhkvadnu:737: 03801 api ca na kiṃcit pūrva-pakṣa-vādino hetv-ābhāsa-asaṃsparṣe
T11dhkvadnu:738: 03802 nyāyyaṃ nigrahasthānam asti iti tat-sambandhīni sarvāṇy
T11dhkvadnu:739: 03803 eva hetv-ābhāsa-vacanena eva uktāni iti na pṛthag vācyāni
T11dhkvadnu:740: 03804 syuḥ. artha-antara-gamana-āder api hetor asāmarthya eva sambhavāt.
T11dhkvadnu:741: 03805 na hi samarthe hetau sādhye ca siddhe artha-antara-
T11dhkvadnu:742: 03806 gamanaṃ kaścid ārabhate asamarthasya mithyā-pravṛtter iti.
T11dhkvadnu:744: 03808 yaḥ pratijñātam artham anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
T11dhkvadnu:746: 03810 pratiṣedhe kṛte ka evam āha anityaḥ śabda iti parityajati,
T11dhkvadnu:748: 03812 atra api yady udbhāvite api hetor vyabhicāre na sa pakṣaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:749: 03813 parityajati, kiṃ na gṛhyeta. nigṛhīta eva hetv-ābhāsa-abhidhānād
T11dhkvadnu:751: 03815 tasya tad eva adyaṃ nigrahasthānam iti kim anyair 03816 aśakya-paricchedaiḥ klība-pralāpa-ceṣṭitair. upanyastair evaṃ 03817 hy atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt. pakṣa-pratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavatas
T11dhkvadnu:753: 03901 prapalāyitvaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam ity evam ādy api vācyaṃ 03902 syāt, tasmād etad apy asambaddham iti.
T11dhkvadnu:754: 03903 aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetv-antaram.
T11dhkvadnu:755: 03904 nidarśanam eka-prakṛti idaṃ vyaktaṃ parimāṇāt, mṛt-pūrvakāṇāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:758: 03907 ca dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti evaṃ pratyavasthita āha
T11dhkvadnu:760: 03909 duḥkha-moha-samanvitaṃ hi idaṃ sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ 03910 gṛhyate. tasya prakṛty-antara-rūpa-samanvaya-abhāve saty eka-
T11dhkvadnu:761: 04001 prakṛtikatvam iti. tad idam aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:762: 04002 bruvato hetv-antaraṃ bhavati. sati ca hetv-antara-bhāve
T11dhkvadnu:764: 04004 atra api pūrvasya eva hetor anaikāntikasya abhidhānān nigṛhīte 04005 hetv-antara-cintā kva upayujyate. yadi prāk-sādhana-vādī
T11dhkvadnu:765: 04006 hetum anaikāntikam uktvā datta-uttara-avasaraḥ, tena eva nigṛhyate
T11dhkvadnu:770: 04011 prakṛtyāyāṃ kuryān nityaḥ śabdo asparśatvād iti hetuḥ,
T11dhkvadnu:771: 04012 hetuś ca nāma hinoter dhātos tu-śabde pratyaye kṛd-antaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:772: 04013 padam. padaṃ ca nāma-ākhyāta-upasarga-nipātā iti prastutya 04014 nāma-ādīni vyācaṣṭe, idam artha-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānam 04015 abhyupagata-artha-asaṃgatatvād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:776: 04101 samarthane kartavye tad akṛtvā aparasya prasaṅgena aprasaṅgena
T11dhkvadnu:778: 04103 sthānam uttara-vādino api doṣa-udbhāvana-mātrād aparasya upakṣepa 04104 iti.
T11dhkvadnu:782: 04108 idam apy asambaddham, na hi varṇa-krama-nirdeśād eva iṣṭa-
T11dhkvadnu:783: 04109 artha-siddhāv ānarthakyam. yad eva kiṃcid asādhana-aṅgasya
T11dhkvadnu:788: 04113 vater upādānād adoṣa iti cet, syād etat, varṇa-krama-nirdeśavad
T11dhkvadnu:789: 04114 iti vatir atra upāttaḥ so anyadā apy ananurūpaṃ gṛhnati ity
T11dhkvadnu:790: 04115 adoṣa iti. na, artha-antara-āder nigrahasthānasya avacana-prasaṅgāt,
T11dhkvadnu:791: 04116 evaṃ hi tā na pṛthag vācyā nirarthakena eva abhidhānāt.
T11dhkvadnu:792: 04201 na sādhya-siddhāv anarthakaṃ nirarthakam, yasya na eva
T11dhkvadnu:793: 04202 kaścid arthaḥ, tan nirarthakam iṣṭam iti cet, yasya kasyacid 04203 avādino api hi nirarthaka-abhidhāne kiṃ na nigraho nigraha-
T11dhkvadnu:795: 04205 na, tasya iha aprastāvād iti cet, āyātam iha yo nirarthakaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:796: 04206 bravīti, tasya tena eva nigraha iti. tat tulyaṃ sarvasya asādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:797: 04207 aṅga-vādina iti. sa sarvo nirarthaka-abhidhāyy anena eva 04208 nigrahasthānena nigraha-arhaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:798: 04209 na ca varṇa-krama-nirdeśaḥ sarvatra nirarthakaḥ kvacit-
T11dhkvadnu:799: 04210 prakaraṇe tasya api arthavattvāt. tasmād atra eva asya ānarthakyāt 04211 nigrahasthānatvam.
T11dhkvadnu:800: 04212 api ca atyalpam idam ucyate varṇa-krama-nirdeśo nigrahasthānam
T11dhkvadnu:803: 04215 parṣat-prativādibhyāṃ trir-abhihitam apy avijñātam 04216 avijñāta-artham. yad vākyaṃ parṣadā prativādinā ca trir-abhihitaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:805: 04218 uccāritam ity evam ādinā kāraṇena, tad avijñāta-artham, asāmarthya-
T11dhkvadnu:807: 04302 na idaṃ nirarthakād bhidyate. sa yadi prakṛta-artha-sambaddhaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:808: 04303 gamakam eva kuryāt, na asya-asāmarthyam, tatra
T11dhkvadnu:809: 04304 jāḍyāt parṣad-ādayo na pratipadyanta iti na vidvān nigraham
T11dhkvadnu:811: 04306 parṣat-prajñām aparikalpya vacanān nigraha-arha eva iti cet,
T11dhkvadnu:812: 04307 nyāyavādino jāḍyād uktam ajānan kiṃ na prativādī nigṛhyate.
T11dhkvadnu:813: 04308 jāḍyāt parṣad-āder avijñāta-pratipādana-asāmarthya iti vijetā na
T11dhkvadnu:815: 04310 eva iti na pṛthag avijñāta-arthaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti.
T11dhkvadnu:817: 04312 anekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇa yogo
T11dhkvadnu:818: 04313 na asti ity asambaddha-arthatā gṛhyate, tat samudāya-arthasya apāyād
T11dhkvadnu:821: 04402 nirarthakāt pṛthag uktam nanv evam asambaddha-vākyam
T11dhkvadnu:822: 04403 api pṛthag vācyaṃ syāt. na ubhaya-saṃgrahāt apārthakam,
T11dhkvadnu:823: 04404 nirarthakasya api saṃgraha-prasaṅgāt. evaṃvidhāc ca viśeṣa-
T11dhkvadnu:825: 04406 apy uktaḥ. na ca saṃgraha-nirdeśe kiṃcid doṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:826: 04407 prabhede vā guṇa-antaram iti yat kiṃcid etat.
T11dhkvadnu:828: 04409 yathālakṣaṇam artha-vaśāt kramaḥ, tatra avayavānāṃ viparyayeṇa
T11dhkvadnu:830: 04411 na, evam api siddher iti cet, na prayoga-apeta-śabda-tulyatvāt.
T11dhkvadnu:831: 04412 yathā gaur ity asya padasya arthe goṇī iti prayujyamānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:832: 04413 padaṃ kakuda-ādimantam arthaṃ pratipādyati iti. na śabda-anvākhyānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:833: 04414 vyartham, anena padena go-śabdam eva pratipadyate,
T11dhkvadnu:836: 04501 ca artham iti, tathā hi pūrvaṃ karma-upādīyate tataḥ karaṇaṃ 04502 mṛt-piṇḍa-ādikaṃ loka iti.
T11dhkvadnu:837: 04503 tad etad unmattasya unmatta-saṃvarṇanam iva prayoga-apeta-
T11dhkvadnu:838: 04504 śabda-vad etad iti. yadi goṇī-śabdāt kakuda-ādimaty
T11dhkvadnu:839: 04505 arthe pratītiḥ, śabda-anvākhyāna-prayatnena arthaṃ na paśyāmaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:841: 04508 vyutpatty-artham anvākhyānam iti cet, nanu goṇī-śabdād api
T11dhkvadnu:842: 04509 loke pratītir dṛṣṭā. satyaṃ dṛṣṭā, na tu sākṣād ity uktam.
T11dhkvadnu:843: 04510 uktam etan na punar yuktam, strī-śūdrāṇām ubhaya-pratīter
T11dhkvadnu:844: 04511 abhāvāt. yaḥ khalu ubhayaṃ vetti śabdam apaśabdaṃ ca, sa
T11dhkvadnu:845: 04512 evaṃ pratipadyate. yas tu nakka-śabdaṃ mukka-śabdam eva
T11dhkvadnu:846: 04513 vā vetti, na nāsā-śabdam, sa katham apaśabdāc śabdaṃ pratipadya 04514 tato arthaṃ pratipadyeta. dṛṣṭā ca anubhaya-vedino api
T11dhkvadnu:848: 04516 arthe asamarthasya śabde api pratīti-janana-asāmarthyāc ca.
T11dhkvadnu:849: 04517 na hy arthe api vācakatvaṃ nāma anyad eva tad-viṣaya-pratīti-
T11dhkvadnu:850: 04518 jananāt. apaśabdaś cec śabde pratītiṃ janayet, artha eva 04519 kiṃ na janayati. na hy etasya arthāt kiṃcid bhayaṃ paśyāmo
T11dhkvadnu:852: 04601 akṛta-samayasya śabde apy apratīti-jananāc ca. na hy 04602 ayam apaśabdaḥ śabde api svabhāvataḥ pratītiṃ janayaty
T11dhkvadnu:853: 04603 adarśanāt, samayata eva tu janayet. samaya-vaśād vartamāno
T11dhkvadnu:854: 04604 artha eva kiṃ na pravartate. evaṃ hi pratipatti-paraṃparā-
T11dhkvadnu:857: 04607 apaśabdair eva bahulaṃ vyutpadyamānā loke dṛśyante
T11dhkvadnu:860: 04610 ko ayaṃ śabdānāṃ saṃskāraḥ. na hy eṣāṃ prajñā-bāhu-śruty-
T11dhkvadnu:861: 04611 ādikaṃ saṃskāraṃ paśyāmaḥ, na apy eṣām ekāntena
T11dhkvadnu:862: 04612 śravyatā, na apy artha-pratyāyane kaścid atiśayaḥ. na
T11dhkvadnu:864: 04614 apy adharma-utpatteḥ, anyebhyo api viparyaye dharma-utpatteḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:866: 04616 na ca evaṃvidhān āgamān ādriyante yuktijñāḥ. na ca 04617 dāna-ādi-dharma-sādhana-codanā-śūnya-kevala-śabda-suprayogān
T11dhkvadnu:867: 04618 naraka-pātam iti bruvāṇasya kasyacin mukhaṃ vakrībhavati.
T11dhkvadnu:868: 04619 tasmān na saṃskṛto nāma kaścic śabdaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:869: 04701 śiṣṭa-prayogaḥ saṃskāra iti cet, ke śiṣṭāḥ. ye vidita-vedyatā-
T11dhkvadnu:872: 04703 yat te amūn eva śabdān prayuñjate, na aparān. na
T11dhkvadnu:873: 04704 ca atra kaścic śabde parokṣaḥ sākṣī, yata idam evaṃ niścinumaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:874: 04705 prayuñjate nāma śiṣṭāḥ. nanv evaṃ vayaṃ guṇa-atiśayam
T11dhkvadnu:878: 04709 saty api guṇa atiśaye na karaṇīya eva anvākhyāne yatnaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:881: 04712 kiṃcil lakṣaṇam asti, atha ca sampradāya-vaśāt tā lokas 04713 tathā eva pratipadyate tāsāṃ ca prayoga-bhraṃśam tathā
T11dhkvadnu:882: 04714 saṃskṛtānāṃ śabdānāṃ pratītir bhaviṣyati iti. jaḍa-pravṛttir
T11dhkvadnu:883: 04715 eva eṣā, yā śabdānāṃ lakṣaṇe pravṛttiḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:884: 04801 avayava-viparyaye api yadi teṣāṃ vacanānāṃ sambandha-pratītir, na
T11dhkvadnu:885: 04802 viparyayo na apy artha-apratītiḥ sāmarthyāt. na hy atra kaścit
T11dhkvadnu:886: 04803 samayaḥ pratyāyana-aviśeṣe apy evam eva avayavāḥ prayoktavyā 04804 iti.
T11dhkvadnu:887: 04805 sa eva teṣāṃ kramo yathāvasthitebhyo artha-pratītir bhavati iti 04806 na viparyayāt pratītiḥ, tata ānupūrvī-pratipattyā pratītir
T11dhkvadnu:889: 04808 yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ kaścit sambandho jāyate, idam iha 04809 sambadhyata iti teṣu vidita-sambandheṣu kaḥ kasya pūrvo
T11dhkvadnu:890: 04810 aparo vā kramaḥ, yena krameṇa vyavasthāpyeran. sambandha-
T11dhkvadnu:891: 04811 pratipattau sa eva teṣāṃ kramaḥ, yo yathāvasthitānāṃ 04812 sambandhaḥ pratīyate. na hi vākyeṣu padānāṃ krama-niyamaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:892: 04813 kaścit, yathā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, puruṣo rajña iti. yāvadbhiḥ
T11dhkvadnu:893: 04814 padair artha-parisamāptiḥ tadā ekaṃ vākyam, yathā
T11dhkvadnu:894: 04815 devadatta gām ānaya kṛṣṇām iti. atra padānāṃ yathākāmaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:895: 04816 prayoge api na artha-pratītau viśeṣa iti kaścit krama-abhiniveśaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:896: 04818 pratipāditaṃ ca pratijñā-vacana-antareṇa api yathārthaṃ 04819 pratītir bhaviṣyati iti pratīyamāna-arthasya ca śabdasya prayoge
T11dhkvadnu:898: 04901 dharmiṇi bhāvaḥ pradarśyeta, dharmiṇi bhāvaṃ pradarśya
T11dhkvadnu:899: 04902 sambandhaḥ pradarśyeta iti na niyamaḥ kaścid ubhayathā api 04903 pratīty-utpatter ity uktam. apratīyamāna-sambandheṣu ca padeṣu 04904 na tebhya ānupūrvyā api pratītir iti na idam apārthakād
T11dhkvadnu:900: 04905 bhidyata iti; na aprāptakālaṃ pṛthag vācyaṃ syād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:901: 04906 hīnam anyatamena apy avayavena nyūnam. yasmin vākye 04907 pratijñā-ādīnām anyatamo avayavo na bhavati, tad vākyaṃ 04908 hīnaṃ sādhana-abhāve sādhyā-siddheḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:902: 04909 na pratijñā-nyūnaṃ hīnaṃ tad-abhāve pratīti-bhāvād iti
T11dhkvadnu:903: 04910 pratipāditam. hīnam eva tat nyūnatāyām api nigrahād ity
T11dhkvadnu:904: 04911 aparaḥ. yaḥ pratīyamāna-artham anarthakaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte,
T11dhkvadnu:905: 04912 sa nigraham arhet. na artha-upasaṃhitasya abhidhātā ity 04913 asamīkṣita-abhidhānam etat. ata eva ca pratijñāyā na sādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:908: 04916 ānarthakyam iti tad etan niyama-abhyupagame veditavyam.
T11dhkvadnu:911: 04920 tu na kaścid doṣo niyama-abhāvād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:913: 05002 śabda-punaruktam anityaḥ śabdo anityaḥ śabda iti.
T11dhkvadnu:916: 05005 atra na śabda-punaruktaṃ pṛthag vācyam artha-punarukta-
T11dhkvadnu:917: 05006 vacanena eva gatatvāt. na hy artha-bhede śabda-sāmye api
T11dhkvadnu:919: 05008 hasati hasati svāminy uccai rudaty atiroditi /
T11dhkvadnu:923: 05012 yathā vā yad yasmin bhavati bhavati, na bhavati na bhavati,
T11dhkvadnu:924: 05013 tat tasya kāryam, itarat kāraṇam iti.
T11dhkvadnu:927: 05016 artha-punaruktena eva gata-arthatvāt na pṛthag vācyam. ayam
T11dhkvadnu:928: 05017 api niyata-sādhana vākya eva doṣo vaktavyaḥ, na vistara-kathāyām,
T11dhkvadnu:930: 05019 śaṅkayā sākṣi-prabhṛtīnāṃ punaḥ punar brūyāt, api na tatra
T11dhkvadnu:932: 05021 na aviṣayatvād iti cet, na ayaṃ gurur na śiṣya iti na yatnataḥ 05101 pratipādaniyaḥ, yena punaḥ punar ucyata iti punarvacane
T11dhkvadnu:933: 05102 nigraha eva iti cet, na, sākṣiṇāṃ yatnena pratipādyatvāt,
T11dhkvadnu:937: 05106 na ca idam adhikād bhidyata iti na pṛthag vācyam. viniyata-
T11dhkvadnu:938: 05107 pada-prayoge hi sādhana-vākye ādhikya-doṣa iti punarvacane 05108 api gata-arthasya-ādhikyam eva padasya iti.
T11dhkvadnu:943: 05113 doṣa iti ādhikya-punarvacanayos tulya-doṣa iti saṃgraha-
T11dhkvadnu:944: 05114 vacanaṃ nyāyyam, doṣa-abhāvād eva guṇa-abhāvāt, evaṃprakārānāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:945: 05115 bhedānāṃ vacane ca atiprasaṅgād ity uktam.
T11dhkvadnu:946: 05116 paryāya-śabda-kalpo hy aparo hetur eka-hetu-pratipādite viṣaye
T11dhkvadnu:949: 05201 yat punar uktam, anuvāde tv apunaruktaṃ śabda-abhyāsād
T11dhkvadnu:951: 05203 punarvacanaṃ nigamanam iti, pratijñāyā eva gamyamāna-arthāyā
T11dhkvadnu:952: 05204 vacanaṃ punarvacanam, kiṃ punar asyāḥ punarvacanam
T11dhkvadnu:955: 05207 vijñāta-vākya-arthasya parṣadā prativādinā 05208 trir-abhihitasya yad apratyuccāraṇam, tad ananubhāṣaṇaṃ 05209 nāma nigrahasthānam. apratyuccārayan kim-āśrayaṃ para-
T11dhkvadnu:957: 05211 uttareṇa avasānān na idaṃ nigrahasthānam iti cet, syād
T11dhkvadnu:958: 05212 etat, uttareṇa guṇa-doṣavatā mūḍha-amūḍhatvaṃ gamyata iti 05213 kiṃ punar-uccāritena. asti hi kaścid uttare samartho na
T11dhkvadnu:960: 05214 na asau tāvatā nigraham arhed iti.
T11dhkvadnu:961: 05215 na, uttara-viṣaya-aparijñānāt. yady ayaṃ na pratyuccārayati,
T11dhkvadnu:962: 05216 nirviṣayam uttaraṃ prasajyeta. atha uttaraṃ bravīti,
T11dhkvadnu:963: 05217 kathaṃ na uccārayati. tad idaṃ vyāhatam ucyate, na uccārayaty 05301 uttaraṃ ca bravīti iti. apratijñānāc ca. na ca idaṃ pratijñāyate,
T11dhkvadnu:964: 05302 pūrvaṃ sarvam uccārayitavyam, paścād uttaram 05303 abhidhātavyam iti, api tu yathākathaṃcid uttaraṃ vācyam,
T11dhkvadnu:965: 05304 uttaraṃ ca āśraya-abhāve ayuktam iti, yuktam apratyuccāraṇaṃ 05305 nigrahasthānam
T11dhkvadnu:967: 05307 aparāparaṃ ghoṣayet, vivāda-āspadaṃ ca jijñāsitam 05308 artha-mātram uktvā pratijñā-ādiṣv artha-viśeṣa-paraṃparayā aparān
T11dhkvadnu:968: 05309 arthān upakṣipya kathāṃ vistārayet, tac ca sarvaṃ yadā
T11dhkvadnu:969: 05310 na anuvaktuṃ śaknuyāt, kas tasya vivāda-āśraya-artha-mātra-uttara-
T11dhkvadnu:975: 05316 upakṣepaḥ, tad avaśyaṃ sādhana-aṅga-viṣayatvād dūṣaṇena upadarśyata 05317 eva. tatra api na sarvaṃ prāg anukrameṇa uccāritavyam,
T11dhkvadnu:976: 05318 paścād dūṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ dvir uccāraṇa-prasaṅgāt. dūṣaṇa-
T11dhkvadnu:978: 05402 ghoṣaṇaṃ vyartham iti, na kāryam eva dūṣayatā asya ayaṃ doṣa
T11dhkvadnu:980: 05404 kriyata eva. na hi sarva-viṣaya-upadarśanaṃ kṛtvā yugapad 05405 doṣaḥ śakyate abhidhātum, pratyarthaṃ doṣa-bhedāt. tasmād
T11dhkvadnu:981: 05406 yaṃ padārthaṃ dūṣayati, sa eva tad-dūṣaṇa-viṣayas tadā
T11dhkvadnu:982: 05407 pradarśanīyo na aparaḥ, tad-dūṣaṇe apara-upadarśanasya asambhavāt.
T11dhkvadnu:983: 05408 tasmin dūṣite punar anyo artho apara-doṣa-viṣaya ity
T11dhkvadnu:984: 05409 ayam anubhāṣaṇe dūṣaṇe ca nyāyaḥ. sakṛt-sarva-anubhāṣaṇe
T11dhkvadnu:985: 05410 api doṣa-vacana-kāle punar viṣayaḥ pradarśanīya eva, apradarśite
T11dhkvadnu:986: 05411 doṣasya vaktum aśakyatvāt. tathā ca dvir-anubhāṣaṇaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:989: 05413 dūṣaṇa-vādinā dūṣaṇe vaktavye yan na tatra upayujyate,
T11dhkvadnu:990: 05414 tasya abhidhānam adoṣa-udbhāvanaṃ dvir-uktiś ca iti 05415 sakṛt-sarva-anubhāṣaṇaṃ parājaya-adhikaraṇaṃ vācyam.
T11dhkvadnu:991: 05416 tathā astv iti cet, syād etat, uktaṃ etad artha-antaraṃ
T11dhkvadnu:993: 05417 iti. tatra sādhane yataḥ kutaścit prasaṅga-ādinā
T11dhkvadnu:994: 05418 anāntarīyakā-abhidhānaṃ vādino artha-antara-gamanam eva iti 05419 sa nigrahā-arhaḥ. na kaścit tat-kathita-kriyamāṇa-prasaṅgo
T11dhkvadnu:995: 05420 na prasajyate. na api tat tasya anubhāṣaṇīyam, na ca idam apy
T11dhkvadnu:996: 05421 asmābhir anujñāyate, sarvaṃ prāk sakṛd vaktavyaṃ paścād 05422 dūṣaṇam iti, kiṃ tu dūṣayatā avaśyaṃ viṣayo darśanīyo
T11dhkvadnu:998: 05501 evaṃ tarhi na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag nigrahasthānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:999: 05502 vācyam apratibhayā gatatvāt, uttarasya hy apratipattir
T11dhkvadnu:1000: 05503 apratibhā. na ca uttara-viṣayam apradarśayann uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1004: 05507 eva, gavi vihitam iva sāsnā-ādimattvaṃ bāhuleye api. tasmād
T11dhkvadnu:1005: 05508 apratibhā eva nigraha-adhikaraṇatvena vācyā, na ananubhāṣaṇam.
T11dhkvadnu:1006: 05510 kaś ca ayaṃ samaya-niyamas trir-abhihitasya ananubhāṣaṇam
T11dhkvadnu:1007: 05511 iti. yadi tāvat para-pratipādana-arthā pravṛttiḥ, kiṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1008: 05512 trir abhidhīyeta. tathā tathā sa grāhaṇīyaḥ, yathā asya pratipattir
T11dhkvadnu:1009: 05513 bhavati. atha para-upatāpana-arthā, tadā api kiṃ trir
T11dhkvadnu:1010: 05514 abhidhīyate, sākṣiṇāṃ karṇe nivedya prativādī kaṣṭa-pratīta-
T11dhkvadnu:1012: 05601 vimūḍhas tūṣṇīṃbhavati. na hi para-upatāpana-krame kaścin
T11dhkvadnu:1014: 05603 trir-abhidhānaṃ vā vidhīyate. na ca para-upatāpāya santaḥ pravartante 05604 śāstrāṇi vā praṇīyante ity ado vaktavyam. tasmāt
T11dhkvadnu:1015: 05605 tāvad vaktavyam, yāvad anena na gṛhītam, na trir eva. agrahaṇa-
T11dhkvadnu:1018: 05608 avijñātaṃ ca ajñānam. vijñātaṃ parṣadā prativādinā yad
T11dhkvadnu:1019: 05609 avijñātam, tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam. arthe khalv 05610 avijñāte na tasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1020: 05611 etad apy ananubhāṣaṇa-vad apratibhayā eva gamyatvād
T11dhkvadnu:1022: 05613 pratipattir aśakyā iti anuttara-pratipattyā eva nigrahasthānatvam 05614 uttara-viṣaya-pradarśana-prasaṅgam antareṇa anubhāṣaṇasya 05615 vaiyarthyāt, tathā-jñāne apy uttara-apratipattyā eva
T11dhkvadnu:1024: 05701 ca uttaraṃ brūyād iti viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-jñānaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1026: 05703 artho hi na anubhāṣet. ananubhāṣamāṇo viṣayam 05704 apradarśya-uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śaknuyād iti uttaraṃ 05705 na pratipadyeta jñāta-uttara-tad-viṣayasya uttara-apratipatter
T11dhkvadnu:1029: 05707 tad-abhāve pratipattir bhavaty eva iti tayoḥ pṛthag vacane
T11dhkvadnu:1030: 05708 apratibhāyāḥ ko viṣaya iti vaktavyam, nirviṣayatvād avācyā 05709 eva syāt.
T11dhkvadnu:1031: 05710 na uttara-ajñānam ajñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi viṣaya-ajñānam, ajñāte
T11dhkvadnu:1032: 05711 hi viṣaye uttara-ajñānāt tan na pratipadyeta iti asti viṣayo
T11dhkvadnu:1034: 05712 iti cet, evaṃ tarhy ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nirviṣayam,
T11dhkvadnu:1035: 05713 ajñānena ākṣepāt. na hi viṣayaṃ samyak pratipadyamānaḥ 05714 kaścin na anubhāṣeta iti na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag vācyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1036: 05715 uttara-ajñānasya ca ākṣepāt. viṣaya-ajñānena uttara-ajñānam apy
T11dhkvadnu:1037: 05716 ākṣiptam eva. na hi viṣayam ajānann uttaraṃ jānāti iti na eva
T11dhkvadnu:1040: 05801 jñāte api viṣaye punar uttara-ajñānam apratibhāyā viṣaya 05802 iti cet, evaṃ tarhi viṣaya-uttara-ajñānayor api prabhedān nigrahasthāna-
T11dhkvadnu:1041: 05803 antarāṇi vācyāni. yathā ajñānasya viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-
T11dhkvadnu:1042: 05804 ajñānam iti prabhedād asaty api guṇa-atiśaye nigrahasthāna-
T11dhkvadnu:1043: 05805 antara-vyavasthā kriyate, tathā ajñānayor api sarvā-jñāna-ardha-
T11dhkvadnu:1044: 05806 ajñānam ity ādi-prabhedān nigrahasthāna-antarāṇi kiṃ na ucyante.
T11dhkvadnu:1045: 05807 na ca ubhayasya apy ajñānasya saṃgraha-vacane kaścid
T11dhkvadnu:1046: 05808 doṣaḥ, guṇas tu syād iti saṃgraha-vacanaṃ nyāyyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1051: 05812 vacanena eva sarvam uktam iti. tad-ubhaya-ākṣipteṣu prabhedeṣu
T11dhkvadnu:1052: 05813 guṇa-atiśayam antareṇa vacana-āder atiprasaṅgād vyarthaḥ 05814 prapañca iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1054: 05816 uttaraṃ yadā na pratipadyate, tadā nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1059: 05901 kārya-vyāsaṅgāt kathā-vicchedo vikṣepaḥ. yat kiṃcit kartavyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1060: 05902 vyāsajya kathāṃ vicchinatti, idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1061: 05903 parihīyate, asminn avasite paścāt kariṣyāmi, pratiśyāyakalā
T11dhkvadnu:1062: 05904 me kaṇṭhaṃ kṣiṇoty evam-ādinā kathāṃ vicchinatti, sa vikṣepo 05905 nāma nigrahasthānam. ekatara-nigraha-antāyāṃ kathāyāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1064: 05907 idam apy yadi pūrvapakṣa-vādī kuryād vyāja-upakṣepa-mātreṇa,
T11dhkvadnu:1067: 05910 vikṣepaḥ syāt. tathā ca idam artha-antara-gamana eva antarbhaved 05911 asamartha-sādhana-abhidhānād hetv-ābhāseṣu vā. prakṛta-
T11dhkvadnu:1069: 05913 na bhidyate. atiprasaṅgaś ca evaṃprakārāṇām asambaddha-
T11dhkvadnu:1071: 06002 vyavasthāpane proktaḥ. atha uttarapakṣa-vādy evaṃ vikṣipet,
T11dhkvadnu:1072: 06003 tasya api sādhana-anantaram uttare pratipattavye tad-apratipattyā
T11dhkvadnu:1074: 06006 nanu na avaśyaṃ sādhana-dūṣaṇābhyām eva sarvasya pratipattir,
T11dhkvadnu:1076: 06008 hetv-ābhāseṣv apratibhāyāṃ vā antarbhavet. bhavati hi anibaddhena
T11dhkvadnu:1077: 06009 api kathā-prapañcena vivāda iti, na, asambhavāt.
T11dhkvadnu:1078: 06010 ekatra adhikaraṇe viruddha-abhyupagamayor vivādaḥ syāt, aviruddha-
T11dhkvadnu:1084: 06016 anyathā pareṣām apratipatteḥ, apareṇa ca tat-sambandhi dūṣaṇam.
T11dhkvadnu:1087: 06101 dvayaṃ na atipatati. etena eva vitaṇḍā pratyukta-abhyupagama-
T11dhkvadnu:1089: 06103 yadā tarhy abhyupagamya vādaṃ viphalatayā na kiṃcid
T11dhkvadnu:1090: 06104 vakti, anyad vā yat kiṃcit pralapati, tadā kathaṃ hetv-ābhāsa-
T11dhkvadnu:1092: 06106 anabhidhāna anya-abhidhānayor api parājaya eva ity uktam 06107 abhyupagamya vādam asādhana-aṅga-vacanāt. etena adhikasya 06108 punaruktasya ca pratijñā-āder vacanasya ca nigrahasthānatvaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1097: 06114 yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣam anuddhṛtya, bhavato
T11dhkvadnu:1098: 06115 apy ayaṃ doṣa iti bravīti, yathā bhavāṃś cauraḥ puruṣatvād
T11dhkvadnu:1099: 06116 ity ukte sa taṃ pratibrūyād, bhavān api iti, sa sva-pakṣe
T11dhkvadnu:1103: 06201 atra api yadi puruṣatvāc cauro bhavān api syāt, na ca bhavatā
T11dhkvadnu:1104: 06202 ātmā evam iṣṭaḥ, tasmān na ayaṃ caurya-hetur iti yady 06203 ayam abhiprāyaḥ, tadā na kaścid doṣaḥ, anabhimate tad-ātmani
T11dhkvadnu:1106: 06205 prasaṅgam antareṇa āñjasena eva kiṃ na vyabhicārita iti 06206 cet, yat kiṃcid etat, santi hy evaṃprakārā api vyavahārā loka
T11dhkvadnu:1107: 06207 iti. atha tad upakṣepam abhyupagacchaty eva, tadā apy 06208 asāv uttara-apratipattyā eva tat-sādhane nigraha-arhaḥ, na aparatra 06209 sva-doṣa-upakṣepāt, tat-sādhana-nirdoṣatāyāṃ hi tad-abhyupagama
T11dhkvadnu:1108: 06210 eva uttara-apratipattir iti tāvatā eva pūrvam āpanna-nigrahasya
T11dhkvadnu:1111: 06213 nāma nigraha-upapattyā codanīyaḥ, tasya upekṣaṇaṃ 06214 nigraha-prāpto asi ity ananuyogaḥ. etac ca kasya parājaya
T11dhkvadnu:1112: 06215 ity anuyuktayā parṣadā vaktavyam, na khalu nigraha-prāptaḥ
T11dhkvadnu:1114: 06301 atra api yadi sādhana-vādinaṃ nigraha-prāptam uttara-vādī
T11dhkvadnu:1115: 06302 na paryanuyuṅkte, apratibhā eva asya uttara-apratipatter iti na 06303 paryanuyojya-upekṣaṇaṃ pṛthag nigrahasthānam. nyāya-cintāyāṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1116: 06304 punar na dvayor ekasya api atra jaya-parājayau, sādhana-
T11dhkvadnu:1118: 06306 atha kaṃcid doṣam udbhāvayati, kaṃcin na, na tadā 06307 nigraham arhati uttara-pratipatteḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1119: 06308 arhati eva, sarvasya sato doṣasya anudbhāvanād iti cet, na
T11dhkvadnu:1120: 06309 santa iti kṛtvā sarve doṣā avaśyaṃ vaktavyā avacane vā
T11dhkvadnu:1122: 06311 yathā ekasya artha-asya aneka-sādhana-sadbhāve apy ekena eva
T11dhkvadnu:1123: 06312 tat-siddher na sarva-upādānam iti na doṣam udbhāvayann eva aparasya
T11dhkvadnu:1126: 06402 na nigṛhṇāti, tadā tayor nyāyena na ekasya api pūrvavaj
T11dhkvadnu:1128: 06404 sādhanād anutsārayato asamarthita-sādhana-aṅgatvān na jayo 06405 vādinaḥ, sarva-doṣa-asambhava-pradarśanena
T11dhkvadnu:1130: 06407 evam api na paryanuyojya-upekṣaṇaṃ nāma parājaya-adhikaraṇam
T11dhkvadnu:1133: 06410 lakṣaṇasya mithyā-avasāyād anigrahasthāne nigṛhīto 06411 asi iti bruvan niranuyojya-anuyogān nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
T11dhkvadnu:1134: 06412 atra api yadi tat-sādhana-vādinam abhūtair doṣair uttara-
T11dhkvadnu:1135: 06413 vādy abhiyuñjīta, so asthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya abhiyokta-
T11dhkvadnu:1136: 06414 udbhāvayitā na bhavati. tathā ca bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvana-lakṣaṇasya
T11dhkvadnu:1138: 06501 apratibhayā eva nigṛhīta iti na idam ato nigrahasthāna-antaram.
T11dhkvadnu:1140: 06504 aparo doṣa-ābhāsa-vacanena abhiyuñjīta, tasya tena bhūta-
T11dhkvadnu:1141: 06505 doṣatve pratipādite sādhana-ābhāsa-vacanena eva nigṛhīta iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1142: 06506 evam api na idaṃ hetv-ābhāsebhyo bhidyate. avaśyaṃ hi 06507 viṣaya-antara-vyāpty-arthaṃ hetv-ābhāsā nigrahasthānatvena
T11dhkvadnu:1146: 06511 artha-viparyayāt kathā-prasaṅgaṃ kurvato apasiddhānto 06512 vijñeyaḥ. yathā na sato vināśaḥ, na asad utpadyata iti siddhāntam 06513 abhyupetya pakṣam avasthāpayati ekā prakṛtir 06514 vyaktasya, vikārāṇām anvaya-darśanāt. mṛd-anvayānāṃ śarāva-
T11dhkvadnu:1147: 06515 ādīnāṃ dṛṣṭam eka-prakṛtikatvam, tathā ca ayaṃ vyakta-
T11dhkvadnu:1149: 06602 eka-prakṛtir iti. sa evam uktavān paryanuyujyate.
T11dhkvadnu:1150: 06603 atha prakṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam iti. yasya avasthitasya 06604 dharma-antara-nivṛttau dharma-antaraṃ pravartate,
T11dhkvadnu:1151: 06605 sā prakṛtiḥ. yat tad dharma-antaram, sa vikāra iti. so ayaṃ 06606 prakṛta-artha-viparyayād aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayati. pratijñātaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1152: 06607 khalv anena na asad āvirbhavati, na sat tirobhavati iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1153: 06608 sad-asatoś ca tirobhāva-āvirbhāvāv antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛtty-
T11dhkvadnu:1154: 06609 uparamaḥ pravṛttir vā iti evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sata 06610 ātma-hānam asataś ca ātma-lābham abhyupaiti, apasiddhānto
T11dhkvadnu:1155: 06611 bhavati atha na abhyupaiti, pakṣo asya na sidhyati iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1156: 06612 iha api na kaścid aniyamāt kathā-prasaṅgaḥ yat tena upagatan
T11dhkvadnu:1157: 06613 na asad utpadyate, na sad vinaśyati iti tasya samarthanāya
T11dhkvadnu:1158: 06614 idam uktam eka-prakṛtikam idaṃ vyaktam anvaya-darśanād
T11dhkvadnu:1159: 06615 iti. tatra ekā prakṛtiḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohaḥ. tad-avibhakta-
T11dhkvadnu:1163: 06703 vināśāv iti siddhaṃ bhavati. atra tad-uktasya hetor doṣam 06704 anudbhāvya vikāra-prakṛti-lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayam ayaṃ
T11dhkvadnu:1165: 06706 tatra idaṃ syād vācyam, vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛtti-nivṛtti-
T11dhkvadnu:1166: 06707 dharmakam, na tathā sukha-ādayaḥ. vyaktasya sukha-ādy-anvaye
T11dhkvadnu:1169: 06709 virodhād iti. sukha-ādy-anvaya-darśanād ity asiddho hetur
T11dhkvadnu:1170: 06711 iti. evaṃ hi tasya sādhana-doṣa-udbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito 06712 bhavati. so anupasaṃhṛtya sādhana-doṣaṃ kathāṃ pratānayan 06713 sva-doṣaṃ paratra upakṣipati.
T11dhkvadnu:1171: 06714 ayam eva doṣo anena prakaraṇena ucyata iti cet, eṣa naimittikāṇāṃ 06715 viṣayaḥ, na lokaḥ śabdair apratipāditam arthaṃ 06716 pratipattuṃ samartha iti. sa eva ayaṃ bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyo
T11dhkvadnu:1172: 06717 atra api. yathoktena nyāyena pūrvakasya asādhana-aṅgasya asiddhasya
T11dhkvadnu:1173: 06718 hetor abhidhānād eva nigrahaḥ, na api aniyamāt
T11dhkvadnu:1174: 06719 kathā-prasaṅgād iti. idam api hetv-ābhāseṣv antarbhāvān na 06720 pṛthag vācyam.
T11dhkvadnu:1175: 06801 hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathoktāḥ. hetv-ābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni.
T11dhkvadnu:1178: 06804 ity ata āha yathokta-hetv-ābhāsa-lakṣaṇena eva nigrahasthāna-
T11dhkvadnu:1180: 06806 atra api yathoktaṃ kṛtvā cintyam eva, kiṃ te yathālakṣita-prabhedās
T11dhkvadnu:1181: 06807 tathā eva, āhosvid anyathā iti. tat tu cintyamānam
T11dhkvadnu:1182: 06808 iha atiprasajyata iti na pratanyate. hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathānyāyaṃ 06809 nigrahasthānam iti etāvan-mātram iṣṭam iti.
T11dhkvadnu:1185: 06812 tattva-ālokaṃ timirayati taṃ durvidagdho jano ayaṃ 06813 tasmād yatnaḥ kṛta iha mayā tat-samujjvālanāya //3//
